code: var removeFavorite=function removeFavorite(type,id){if(type==="food"){var temparr=localStorage.getItem("SavedFoods").split(",");temparr.splice(temparr.indexOf(id),1);localStorage.setItem("SavedFoods",temparr);}else if(type==="drink"){var _temparr=localStorage.getItem("SavedDrinks").split(",");_temparr.splice(_temparr.indexOf(id),1);localStorage.setItem("SavedDrinks",_temparr);}else if(type==="reddit"){var _temparr2=localStorage.getItem("SavedSubReddits").split(",");_temparr2.splice(_temparr2.indexOf(id),1);localStorage.setItem("SavedSubReddits",_temparr2);}};export default removeFavorite;
